mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_KF_INVOICE (KF_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS_ID, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_COMPANY, BASIC_KF_FEE, KF_FEE_INVOICE_SUM, TRIPLE_AGREEMENT, AGENCY_PAY_CREDENTIAL, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, KF_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID) VALUES (#{kfFeeInvoiceDetailsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceCompany,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{basicKfFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{kfFeeInvoiceSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tripleAgreement,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{agencyPayCredential,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{carteTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{kfFeePayDetailsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_KF_INVOICE SET INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVOICE_COMPANY = #{invoiceCompany,jdbcType=OTHER}, BASIC_KF_FEE = #{basicKfFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, KF_FEE_INVOICE_SUM = #{kfFeeInvoiceSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRIPLE_AGREEMENT = #{tripleAgreement,jdbcType=OTHER}, AGENCY_PAY_CREDENTIAL = #{agencyPayCredential,jdbcType=OTHER}, CARTE_TIME = #{carteTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, KF_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID = #{kfFeePayDetailsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE KF_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS_ID = #{kfFeeInvoiceDetailsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT KF_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS_ID, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_COMPANY, BASIC_KF_FEE, KF_FEE_INVOICE_SUM, TRIPLE_AGREEMENT, AGENCY_PAY_CREDENTIAL, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, KF_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID FROM T_KF_INVOICE WHERE KF_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS_ID = #{kfFeeInvoiceDetailsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT KF_FEE_INVOICE_DETAILS_ID, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_COMPANY, BASIC_KF_FEE, KF_FEE_INVOICE_SUM, TRIPLE_AGREEMENT, AGENCY_PAY_CREDENTIAL, CARTE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, KF_FEE_PAY_DETAILS_ID FROM T_KF_INVOICE
